name: Deletedocument
description: It allows to delete a document.

dataEntityName.description: Name of the data entity. Defined by the api. Examples of native data entities you can use are `CL` for client profiles and `AD` for client addresses.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.
